name: Treasure Isle
description:
Treasure Isle

You just found an island to store your new found treasure! But pirates heard that you got some good treasure. And they want it for themselves. Build traps to stop them from sealing your treasure.

  • Programming and Art by: Ron Horowitz
  • Music  by Illy Rosen
  • Subscribe to Illy's Youtube channel

Note: This game is a post jam fixes, that means any new updates will be uploaded here. If you want to view the jam version go here
